video.title: Aggretsuko
video.synopsis: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

episodes.synopsis: As Retsuko enters her fifth year at a prestigious trading firm, she struggles to motivate herself every day as the daily stress from work takes a toll.
episodes.title: A Day in the Life of Retsuko

episodes.synopsis: Tired of her wholesome good-girl persona at work, Retsuko is drawn to the free-spirited lifestyle of her former high school classmate, Puko.
episodes.title: A Good, Hard-working Girl

episodes.synopsis: Retsuko loses the will to tackle the daily grind after Puko asks her to join a new business venture. A fed up Retsuko talks back to her supervisor.
episodes.title: Short-timer

episodes.synopsis: When plans to leave her thankless job fall through, Retsuko continues to work in hopes of some day marrying and becoming a full-time housewife.
episodes.title: Walking Down the Aisle

episodes.synopsis: The solitary life Retsuko leads is about to change when Director Gori and Washimi take her to a karaoke bar after yoga class.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: Washimi acknowledges Retsuko's efforts to make things right with Director Ton, using her position as assistant to the president as leverage to help.
episodes.title: Stoking Rebellion

episodes.synopsis: After the president cautions Director Ton on his abrasive behavior, his unusually polite demeanor puzzles and frightens his direct reports.
episodes.title: The Duel

episodes.synopsis: Persuaded by her colleagues Director Gori and Washimi, a reluctant Retsuko agrees to join a company singles mixer hosted by Tsunoda.
episodes.title: The "Out of Pocket" Prince

episodes.synopsis: Supervisor Tsubone sends Retsuko on an errand to the sales department where she falls for a fellow colleague, Resasuke, whom she met the night before.
episodes.title: A Rosy World

episodes.synopsis: A happy but frustrated Retsuko increasingly makes mistakes at work. Meanwhile, a busy quarterly reporting period looms ahead for the accounting team.
episodes.title: The Dream Ends

episodes.synopsis: Retsuko becomes increasingly frustrated with her mother's overbearing ways. Director Ton demands the team be tough on their incoming new hire.
episodes.title: Time to Grow Up

episodes.synopsis: Without Retsuko's approval, her mother sets up an arranged marriage meeting. At first glance, new hire Anai seems like a nice and eager employee.
episodes.title: The New Hire Named Anai

episodes.synopsis: Director Ton berates Retsuko for Anai's lack of progress on the job. Meanwhile, Anai continues to react very badly to any feedback from Retsuko.
episodes.title: Double Moratorium

episodes.synopsis: Retsuko and Anai have to host a food stall for the company’s Family Appreciation Day event, but Retsuko does all the work herself to avoid conflict.
episodes.title: Unavoidable Impact

episodes.synopsis: Everybody hates Retsuko’s badly-prepared yakisoba. Anai doesn’t lift a finger to help, until Kabae gives him some words of encouragement.
episodes.title: United Front

episodes.synopsis: Hearing that Shirota has officially moved on, Retsuko lets herself be talked into attending a matchmaking event -- where she runs into Director Gori.
episodes.title: Unknown Future

episodes.synopsis: Now with a driver's license, Retsuko takes Gori and Washimi on a road trip, but things go south when the two ladies get into a heated argument.
episodes.title: Growing Affection

episodes.synopsis: The unassuming Tadano turns out to be a rising tech mogul. He offers to take Retsuko out for ramen, but it's nothing like she imagined.
episodes.title: He Lives Above the Clouds

episodes.synopsis: Retsuko begins to dream of a happy future with Tadano. She joins him on a business-related golf outing, and is horrified when Director Ton shows up.
episodes.title: She's Dreaming

episodes.synopsis: The world learns all about Retsuko’s high profile relationship and Tadano declares that he wants to be with her forever -- without getting married.
episodes.title: Wonderful Life

episodes.synopsis: With her romance over, Retsuko fills the void with a virtual boyfriend. Her savings take a massive hit when she spends recklessly on in-game purchases.
episodes.title: The Blessings of Life

episodes.synopsis: Retsuko inadvertently backs into a parked car, damaging the other vehicle. Desperate for repair money, she reaches out to Gori for a loan.
episodes.title: Deep in the Hole

episodes.synopsis: To repay her debt, Retsuko starts working as the accounting manager for an underground idol group. In reality, she's at their beck and call.
episodes.title: A Sheltered Life

episodes.synopsis: The OTMGirls turn a profit for the first time thanks to Retsuko’s business acumen. Haida hits it off with Inui after an unexpected encounter.
episodes.title: Winds of Change

episodes.synopsis: After seeing Retsuko sing, Hyodo proposes that Retsuko become the lead vocalist, demoting Manaka in the process.
episodes.title: An Urchin in the Desert

episodes.synopsis: The group’s popularity soars after a blogger's favorable review. Concerned by Retsuko's recent odd behavior, Haida secretly tails her to Hokkaido.
episodes.title: Crossroads

episodes.synopsis: The OTMGirls receive an offer to perform at a rock festival. Hyodo rebrands the idols as a band, and the members must now learn to play instruments.
episodes.title: An Impenetrable Wall

episodes.synopsis: Manaka’s devotion to instrumental mastery inspires others to step up. Haida agrees to teach Retsuko guitar, but he invites Inui over on the same day.
episodes.title: Bursting Her Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Inui opens up to Haida about her feelings, but he's unable to respond. Director Ton lectures Retsuko when he learns she has a side gig.
episodes.title: The End of the Moratorium

episodes.synopsis: She's shaken, but Retsuko acts normal in front of her bandmates after a deranged fan accosts her. Haida struggles to choose between Retsuko and Inui.
episodes.title: When You Count to Ten
